Title: Nuance Omnipage Professional 
Category: Office 
Year: 2011 
Language: Spanish multilanguage including 
Platform / OS: Windows XP/Vista/7 


Nuance OmniPage Professional - software for optical character recognition (OCR). OmniPage Professional supports over 100 languages ??that can be printed in the original text. The program has convenient tools for image processing, high-quality scans without re-scanning function to convert paper forms into electronic documents to be filled on the screen, the search engine Google Desktop to search the scanned file (and other files) on the words contained therein. OmniPage Professional comes complete with many utilities. In particular converter, PDF - allows you to convert PDF files into editable formats: doc, rtf, WPD, xls. A simplified version of the utility to create PDF, which performs the inverse transformation: it transforms virtually any text or graphics file to PDF. 


Key Features: 
"The most accurate conversion of scanned documents into text files in 123 languages 
"Dictionaries professions Raspoznavatelnye financial, legal and medical 
"Convert PDF to Word documents and Excel 
"Excellent calibration symbols with the recognition 
"An excellent analysis of the pages and high-speed 
"Multi-core parallel processing 
"Options for Document Management 
"Convert between formats of digital documents 
"Convert image files into text documents 
"The tools integrated document management 
"Connecting directly to PaperPort 
"Automatic Data Collection Forms 
"Adjustable speed control 
"Creating an audio documents from paper and digital documents 
"The automatic lighting and strikethrough 

OmniPage uses optical character recognition (OCR) to transform data from scanned pages or image files into electronic files you can edit, search and share in the format of your choice. In just a few clicks, you can be the tasks previously taken hours. OmniPage unlocks the potential of data from your documents. Once you have scanned a document or opening an image file - from any scanning device - you can do things with it without limits, save the format of your choice; file to the network for universal access, extract information and reuse it automatically. 

Here are some key features of "OmniPage" 
Superior OCR accuracy: 
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Improved OCR engines deliver 99 percent + accuracy for document conversion and archiving of critical business documents. 
Maintaining the perfect format: 
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· The converted documents are exactly like the original, and are easier to change than before, with columns, tables, bullets and graphics. 
Simply easier to use: 
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Documents conversion need not be complicated. The Quick Convert View gets the job done in seconds - no need to learn a lot of options and tools. 
Unlock PDF files: 
Rotate any PDF file into your favorite PC application for easy editing. You can also scan documents in search functions of these formats for instant access by desktop search programs. 
Works with any scanner: 
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ If the device can scan then you can work with OmniPage. Mobile scanners, desktop scanners, all-in-one Multi-function printers all work more productively and with better accuracy with OmniPage 
A picture is worth 1,000 words 
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Capture text with a digital camera or iPhone. Quickly convert your pictures to text documents with 3D Correction technology most precise available. 
Email Amazon Kindle: 
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Scan a document is automatically converted into a readable format and sent to the Kindle electronic book reader in one easy step. 
Supports all your favorite applications: 
Supports the widest range of output formats including PDF, HTML, Corel WordPerfect, Microsoft Word, Excel and PowerPoint 2007 and many more formats. 
Recognises over 120 languages: 
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Process, edit and save documents from anywhere in the world. Now includes Chinese, Japanese and Korean. 

Best performance! 
- 67% accuracy improved design 
- Accuracy 18% better word 
- 50% PDF-MRC compression search files without losing precision word 
- Processing of 30% faster on several pages of PDF documents 

NEW! Home provides a guide 
When you open OmniPage are clear choices to open or scan documents, open documents and project workflows OmniPage provides pre-programmed to carry documents from one format to another in one step. 

NEW! PDF productive and precise than ever - PDF eDiscovery Lookup Wizard 
PDF files are everywhere and can come from a variety of sources. May include scanned pages, embedded images, and other information. Many of these elements are not full-text search. The new eDiscovery Assistant PDF Search is a revolution in security convert a single PDF or batch PDF files of all types in fully search documents. Now you do not have to open the PDF files, one by one, or use a recognition process that inadvertently could end up with valuable information. 

NEW! Connect and turn into the cloud 
Download input files web storage sites and return the results of recognition there. OmniPage provides native integration with Evernote and Dropbox. In addition, the Great Cloud of application includes Nuance connector provides access to a range of cloud services, such as Microsoft Live SkyDrive, Google Docs, Box.net and many more. The extra connector Nuance cloud is its ability to integrate directly with Microsoft Windows to provide easy drag and drop the shortcut to cloud services. The connector of the cloud Nuance also be upgraded to a film version richest product called Gladinet Cloud Desktop Pro This enhanced version adds additional functionality to use cloud services for automatic backup and file synchronization. 

Scanned images produce greater accuracy better - Improved Pre-Treatment 
The algorithms for the elimination of spots and image of the page to help increase the accuracy is improved, with a selection of disposal methods of dots (Normal, midtones, salt and pepper). 

NEW! Poorly scanned images need to OmniPage to scan enhancement tools (Tools SET) 
The content of the board is captured by a digital camera, text and diagrams can be improved for maximum readability. Crop pages to auto-detected and reduced margins, remover tools drill and produce clean edges border page without analyzing the shadows and the footnotes. 

NEW! Automatic language detection 
Let the program assigns one language on each page entry in the monitoring process. Choose one of the languages ??with dictionary support that use a Latin alphabet (as Russian and Greek are excluded), as well as Japanese, Korean and Chinese (traditional and simplified). When you activate this function, manual language selection is needed. 

NEW! Better control over the determination of blank pages 
A further adjustment of the sensitivity increases the recognition accuracy of the blank pages that can scan the pages as light gray or color, allowing the threshold of emptiness to be adjusted. This improves the use of two controls: "Leave blank pages' the new pre-processing option and the option of saving existing" Create a new file at each blank page. " 

NEW! ISIS scanners 
Scanners ISIS drivers that support can be used to scan directly into OmniPage.

- CD-ROM for installation 
- WIA, TWAIN or ISIS scanner driver 
- 2 megapixel digital auto-focus camera or higher for text capture digital camera 
- Internet access is required for online activation, registration, live update and connectors Nuance Cloud
